data.title: Apple Is Rebooting Its Search for a New Next Big Thing
data.meta_description: Apple’s search for a bold new product category is back on, and it includes a foray into robots. Also: The company is preparing new iPads and accompanying accessories for May; the Vision Pro gets another Personas upgrade; and Apple makes an eyebrow-raising management change.
data.text:
Apple’s search for a bold new product category is back on, and it includes a foray into robots. Also: The company is preparing new iPads and accompanying accessories for May; the Vision Pro gets another Personas upgrade; and Apple makes an eyebrow-raising management change.

Last time in Power On: The US Justice Department risks picking the wrong fight with Apple.
